verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a dramatic scene on Capitol Hill] , [ARG0: five Democratic members of Congress] [V: protested] [ARGM-MNR: directly] [ARGM-LOC: in front of President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: as he departed a Republican meeting Tuesday] .

In a dramatic scene on Capitol Hill , five Democratic members of Congress protested directly in front of President Donald Trump as [ARG0: he] [V: departed] [ARG1: a Republican meeting] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] .
